snippet: An online video, quickly deleted from Chinese outlets, shows a woman being subdued by bystanders after she called out to President Xi Jinping’s motorcade in the southwestern province of Guizhou.
abstract: An online video, quickly deleted from Chinese outlets, shows a woman being subdued by bystanders after she called out to President Xi Jinping’s motorcade in the southwestern province of Guizhou.

headline.main: Rare Direct Appeal to Xi Jinping Appears, Then Disappears, Online
